Package org.gjt.sp.jedit.options

Global Options dialog box panes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbbrevsOptionPane
    Abbrev editor.
    AppearanceOptionPane  
    BrowserColorsOptionPane
    Browser color editor.
    BrowserContextOptionPane
    Right-click context menu editor.
    BrowserOptionPane  
    BufferOptionPane  
    ContextOptionPane
    Right-click context menu editor.
    DockingOptionPane  
    EditingOptionPane
    Panel to load three option panes into tabs: EditModesPane, ModeSettingsPane, and UndoPane.
    EditModesPane
    Option pane to set available edit modes and to add modes from a file.
    EncodingsOptionPane
    Encodings options.
    FirewallOptionPane  
    GeneralOptionPane
    jEdit's General Options Pane
    GlobalOptions
    A dialog that can open initially to one of the Global Option Panes.
    GutterOptionPane  
    IconTheme  
    LargeFilesOptionPane
    The EditingOptionPane has been split up so the large files option pane is now a separate pane.
    ModeSettingsPane
    Option pane to change the settings of an edit mode.
    MouseOptionPane  
    PluginManagerOptionPane
    The plugin manager option pane.
    PluginOptions
    deprecated use CombinedOptions I've undeprecated this, CombinedOptions does not provide the same api and cannot be traded out for PluginOptions.
    PluginOptions.NoPluginsPane  
    PrintOptionPane  
    SaveBackupOptionPane
    The Save and Backup option panel.
    ShortcutsOptionPane
    Key binding editor.
    StatusBarOptionPane
    Status bar editor.
    SyntaxHiliteOptionPane
    Style option pane.
    TextAreaOptionPane  
    ToolBarOptionPane
    Tool bar editor.
    UndoPane
    Set options for undo here.
    ViewOptionPane
